message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000. This is a one-time opportunity to acquire a truly unique and valuable item, and I believe it's a fair price considering its worth to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $1050000. This is a compromise that I believe still reflects the product's value to you, while also being a fair price for me.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering $950000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer the product to you for $1025000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I understand that you're willing to make another compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your latest offer, so I'm counteroffering $1000000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on this price.

I understand that you're willing to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1000000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $1075000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.
